name: Down the Winding Path (Downloadable)
description:
Down the Winding Path is an interactive, second-person game that puts you, the Player, into the shoes of a child sent out into the woods by their parents to deliver some food and medicine to their sick grandmother. As they go down the seemingly straight and narrow path, they encounter scenarios that require them to choose a path to take as they diverge.

This video game incorporates characters and elements from fairy tales such as Red Riding Hood, Hansel and Gretel, and Rapunzel with changes to the storyline and the endings depending on the choices of the player.
